name: Mustard Greens
properties: Part of Daily Dozen greens and cruciferous vegetables
benefits: Mustard greens are cruciferous green vegetables that provide both greens and cruciferous vegetable benefits. They offer powerful antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds. The slightly spicy flavor adds depth to soups and salads.
amount: Part of Daily Dozen - counts toward both greens (2 servings) and cruciferous (1 serving) daily, typically 2 cups coarsely chopped

quotes: GREENS checkbox in Daily Dozen. CRUCIFEROUS VEGETABLES checkbox in Daily Dozen
2 cups/50g coarsely chopped rocket, watercress or mustard greens - used in Spring Greens Soup
